title: 7.5: Scotland Historical Romances - Interstitial
dc:creator: Sarah MacLean
description: It’s Scotland week, Lads and Lassies! We’re talking about the great green jewel to the north of England, where the ladies are bold and the lairds are brawn, and we're all just wishing we could get wrapped in a plaid and cuddled through a cold Highland night.
itunes:author: Fated Mates
itunes:subtitle: Jen and Sarah talk Scottish romance
itunes:summary: It’s Scotland week, Lads and Lassies! We’re talking about the great green jewel to the north of England, where the ladies are bold and the lairds are brawn, and we're all just wishing we could get wrapped in a plaid and cuddled through a cold Highland night.
